verses.verse: These are the words <S%H1697><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, in the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Suph <S%H5489><s%>, between Paran <S%H6290><s%>, and Tophel <S%H8603><s%>, and Laban <S%H3837><s%>, and Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>, and Di-zahab <S%H1774><s%>.
It is eleven <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey from Horeb <S%H2722><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> unto Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%>.

And it came to pass in the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, according unto all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had given him in commandment unto them <S%H6680><s%>;

after <S%H310><s%> he had smitten <S%H5221><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>, at Edrei <S%H154><s%>.

Beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, began <S%H2974><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to declare <S%H874><s%> this law <S%H8451><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto us in Horeb <S%H2722><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Ye have dwelt <S%H3427><s%> long enough <S%H7227><s%> in this mountain <S%H2022><s%>:

turn <S%H6437><s%> you <S%H5265><s%>, and take your journey, and go <S%H935><s%> to the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and unto all the places nigh <S%H7934><s%> thereunto <S%H6160><s%>, in the Arabah, in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, and in the lowland <S%H8219><s%>, and in the South <S%H5045><s%>, and by the <S%H3220><s%> sea-shore <S%H2348><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, as far as the great <S%H1419><s%> river <S%H5104><s%>, the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H935><s%>: go in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> unto them and to their seed <S%H2233><s%> after them <S%H310><s%>.
And I spake <S%H559><s%> unto you at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> you myself alone <S%H905><s%>:

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath multiplied <S%H7235><s%> you <S%H3117><s%>, and, behold, ye are this day as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>, make you a thousand <S%H505><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> as many as <S%H3254><s%> ye are <S%H1288><s%>, and bless you <S%H1696><s%>, as he hath promised you!
How <S%H349><s%> can I myself alone bear <S%H5375><s%> your cumbrance <S%H2960><s%>, and your burden <S%H4853><s%>, and your strife <S%H7379><s%>?

Take <S%H3051><s%> you wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and understanding <S%H995><s%>, and known <S%H3045><s%>, according to your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and I will make <S%H7760><s%> them heads over you <S%H7218><s%>.
And ye answered <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H559><s%>, and said, The thing <S%H1697><s%> which thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> for us to do <S%H6213><s%>.

So I took <S%H3947><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and known <S%H3045><s%>, and made <S%H5414><s%> them heads <S%H7218><s%> over you <S%H8269><s%>, captains of thousands <S%H505><s%>, and captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, and captains <S%H8269><s%> of fifties <S%H2572><s%>, and captains <S%H8269><s%> of tens <S%H6235><s%>, and officers <S%H7860><s%>, according to your tribes <S%H7626><s%>.

And I charged <S%H6680><s%> your judges <S%H8199><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> the causes between your brethren <S%H251><s%>, and judge <S%H8199><s%> righteously <S%H6664><s%> between a man <S%H376><s%> and his brother <S%H251><s%>, and the sojourner that is with him <S%H1616><s%>.

Ye shall not respect <S%H5234><s%> persons <S%H6440><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>; ye shall hear <S%H8085><s%> the small <S%H6996><s%> and the great <S%H1419><s%> alike <S%H1481><s%>; ye shall not be afraid of the face <S%H6440><s%> of man <S%H376><s%>; for the judgment <S%H4941><s%> is God <S%H430><s%>'s: and the cause <S%H1697><s%> that is too hard <S%H7185><s%> for you ye shall bring <S%H7126><s%> unto me <S%H8085><s%>, and I will hear it.
And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you at that time <S%H6256><s%> all the things <S%H1697><s%> which ye should do <S%H6213><s%>.

And we journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Horeb <S%H2722><s%>, and went through <S%H3212><s%> all that great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%> which ye saw <S%H7200><s%>, by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us <S%H935><s%>; and we came to Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H935><s%>, Ye are come unto the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> giveth unto us <S%H5414><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath set <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H5927><s%>: go up, take possession <S%H3423><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto thee <S%H3372><s%>; fear not <S%H2865><s%>, neither be dismayed.

And ye came near <S%H7126><s%> unto me every one of you <S%H559><s%>, and said, Let us send <S%H7971><s%> men <S%H582><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us <S%H2658><s%>, that they may search the land <S%H776><s%> for us <S%H7725><s%>, and bring us word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> by which we must go up <S%H5927><s%>, and the cities <S%H5892><s%> unto which we shall come <S%H935><s%>.
And the thing <S%H1697><s%> pleased me well <S%H3190><s%>; and I took <S%H3947><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of you <S%H259><s%>, one man for every tribe <S%H376><s%>:

and they turned <S%H6437><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, and spied it out <S%H7270><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> in their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and brought it down <S%H3381><s%> unto us <S%H7725><s%>, and brought us word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, It is a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> giveth unto us <S%H5414><s%>.
Yet ye would <S%H14><s%> not go up <S%H5927><s%>, but rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>:

and ye murmured <S%H7279><s%> in your tents <S%H168><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hated <S%H8135><s%> us <S%H3318><s%>, he hath brought us forth out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to deliver <S%H5414><s%> us into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, to destroy us <S%H8045><s%>.

Whither are we going up <S%H5927><s%>? our brethren <S%H251><s%> have made our heart <S%H3824><s%> to melt <S%H4549><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The people <S%H5971><s%> are greater <S%H1419><s%> and taller <S%H7311><s%> than we <S%H5892><s%>; the cities are great <S%H1419><s%> and fortified up <S%H1219><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and moreover we have seen <S%H7200><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakim there <S%H6062><s%>.
Then I said <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H6206><s%>, Dread not <S%H3372><s%>, neither be afraid of them.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> who goeth <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3898><s%>, he will fight for you <S%H6213><s%>, according to all that he did for you in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>,

and in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, where thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> how that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> bare <S%H5375><s%> thee <S%H376><s%>, as a man doth bear <S%H5375><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, in all the way <S%H1870><s%> that ye went <S%H1980><s%>, until ye came <S%H935><s%> unto this place <S%H4725><s%>.
Yet in this thing <S%H1697><s%> ye did not believe <S%H539><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>,

who went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you in the way <S%H1870><s%>, to seek you out <S%H8446><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> to pitch your tents <S%H2583><s%> in <S%H784><s%>, in fire by night <S%H3915><s%>, to show <S%H7200><s%> you by what way <S%H1870><s%> ye should go <S%H3212><s%>, and in the cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words <S%H1697><s%>, and was wroth <S%H7107><s%>, and sware <S%H7650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Surely there shall not one <S%H376><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%> of this evil <S%H7451><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, which I sware <S%H7650><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>,

save <S%H2108><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>: he shall see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5414><s%>; and to him will I give the land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath trodden upon <S%H1869><s%>, and to his children <S%H1121><s%>, because he hath wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Also Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with me for your sakes <S%H1558><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thou also shalt not go <S%H935><s%> in thither <S%H8033><s%>:

60 <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, who standeth <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H935><s%>, he shall go in thither <S%H2388><s%>: encourage thou him <S%H3478><s%>; for he shall cause Israel to inherit it <S%H5157><s%>.

Moreover your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, that ye said <S%H559><s%> should be a prey <S%H957><s%>, and your children <S%H1121><s%>, that this day <S%H3117><s%> have no knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%> or evil <S%H7451><s%>, they shall go in <S%H935><s%> thither <S%H5414><s%>, and unto them will I give it <S%H3423><s%>, and they shall possess it.
But as for you <S%H6437><s%>, turn you <S%H5265><s%>, and take your journey into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Then ye answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H2398><s%>, We have sinned against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, we will go up <S%H5927><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%>, according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us <S%H2296><s%>. And ye girded on every man <S%H376><s%> his weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, and were forward <S%H1951><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, Say unto them <S%H5927><s%>, Go not up, neither fight <S%H3898><s%>; for I am not among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H5062><s%>; lest ye be smitten before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>.

So I spake <S%H1696><s%> unto you <S%H8085><s%>, and ye hearkened not <S%H4784><s%>; but ye rebelled against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and were presumptuous <S%H2102><s%>, and went <S%H5927><s%> up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>.

And the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in that hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> you <S%H7291><s%>, and chased you <S%H1682><s%>, as bees do <S%H6213><s%>, and beat <S%H3807><s%> you down in Seir <S%H8165><s%>, even unto Hormah <S%H2767><s%>.

And ye returned <S%H7725><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; but Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not to your voice <S%H6963><s%>, nor gave ear unto you <S%H238><s%>.
So ye abode <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, according unto the days <S%H3117><s%> that ye abode there <S%H3427><s%>.
